title: Rang Leela
description: रंग की क्या बात करें,रंग ही तो है सब कुछ...बिना रंग क्या है यहाँ पे...बिना रंग के है क्या कुछ?***Rang ki kya baat karein…Rang hi to hai sab kuchBina rang kya hai yahan pe…Bina rang ke hai kya kuchLife is all about the various experiences and personalities that one comes across. Each experience or interaction shapes the way we think, feel and do things. These experiences form the colours of our lives. And that’s everything we are all about!Let’s experience some of these colours in this poetic odyssey 'Rang Leela'
author: Piyush 'Jayant' Arora
